Windlord::


"then" thought the male "I might be a maximal... after all" after 
that he said "I wonder if you could lead us to your leader, but still 
I'm not sure to join your group; I don't know what think my friend, 
Aerotaur about, but that is a thing that we have to speak with your 
leader before take a decition"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Ragnar expressed his relief by straitghtening a bit. He was a 
warrior,

>

> behalf of Commander Rodimus Prime of the Maximals. He sends his 
> greetings and would wish you to join our group.
